1395820.name: SURVIVAL: Postapocalypse Now Demo
1395820.description:
Demo version of SURVIVAL.
It is a small game plot designed to be played alone.
The demo version allows you to feel the basic mechanics of the game and get some impressions and understand if this game is right for you.
You will be able to test the entire arsenal of small arms and equipments and demining and demolition and survival equipment.
Test your skills in the cold city! For successful completion of the mode, you can receive a reward in the main game.
We wish you all the best in this little adventure!
